instruction: As a real estate investor, you want to estimate the carbon emissions of your residential properties in mortgage-backed securities or property loans. What data do you need to gather and how can you use this information?
output: To estimate the carbon emissions of your residential properties, you will need to gather state-level data on both Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions at the household level. Our analysis indicates strong regional differences in emissions and the drivers of these emissions. You can use this data to track how emissions change over time and accelerate the reduction of emissions in the most efficient manner. This information will help you understand the emissions in either your property loans or mortgage-backed securities and make informed decisions to reduce carbon emissions.
